word:
MR No. 1414 - Unity in the Church

     "And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it." "But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased Him. . . . And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you" [1 Corinthians 12:26, 18, 21].
